content: ***these super cute house plant pot cozies are great for adding a touch of crochet to your home the pattern is adaptable to other pot sizes and also stretches to fit different pot styles perfect for a gift to yourself or a loved one *** if you have any questions about this pattern or any of the other patterns from regina p designs or want to show off your finished projects with our patterns please join our facebook group https //www facebook com/groups/869715883461437/ check out regina p designs website to find out more get sneak peeks free patterns & sales https //www reginapdesigns com/ ***materials *** yarn bee soft & sleek yarns approx 90 yds total i boye 5 25 mm hook scissors needle ***abbreviations us terms *** skip = skip st =stitch sts = stitches blo = back loop only single_crochet = single_crochet fbl = front bottom loop half_double_crochet = half_double_crochet double_crochet = double_crochet shell = 4 double_crochet in one stitch gap = between st 2 and 3 of the shell magic_ring = magic_ring copyright 2026 regina p designs all rights reserved all content copyright and other rights reserved by regina p designs no content may be duplicated without
